publ: by VayuVaidya: Dr Bheemaiah, Anil Kumar
name: HoHGuppy
0:
”Alexa, open hoh guppy”
”Alexa, start hoh guppy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoh guppy
des:
Listen to this story about a young indigenous woman, named Guppy and her son Twig.
The HoH tribe faced soil erosion and leaching issues, as they struggled wrangling with the government for dry land, in this story Guppy their leader innovates C2C solutions for their pains, innovating barrel and recycled alloy based pier homes....
Listen on as you identify with Twig, her son, another innovator and the youngest CEO...
Are you an innovator too and identify with your indigenous self, may be Guppy and Twig live in you too, may be this is the time to wake up and join the tribe of innovators as we solve our pains to a newer economy of innovating!
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
